# we-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `initialState` | `initial-state` |             | `boolean` | `false` |
| `labelLeft`    | `label-left`    |             | `string`  | `""`    |
| `labelRight`   | `label-right`   |             | `string`  | `""`    |


## Events

| Event            | Description | Type               |
| ---------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `switchCallback` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                            | Description                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--container--font-size`        | Font size of labels inside the switch <br> Default: 2em                                          |
| `--container--font-weight`      | Font weight of labels inside the switch <br> Default: bold                                       |
| `--container--height`           | Height of container <br> Default: 6.250em                                                        |
| `--container--width`            | Width of container <br> Default: 12.5em                                                          |
| `--switch--background`          | Background color of switch when in initial condition <br> Default: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)        |
| `--switch--background-change`   | Background color of switch when change from initial condition <br> Default: rgba(186, 218, 85,1) |
| `--switch--border-radius`       | Border radius of switch <br> Default: 6.250em                                                    |
| `--switch--cursor`              | Cursor on switch <br> Default: pointer                                                           |
| `--switch_after--background`    | Background of button switch <br> Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)                                 |
| `--switch_after--border-radius` | Border radius of button switch <br> Default: 5.625em                                             |
| `--switch_after--height`        | Height of button switch <br> Default: 5.625em                                                    |
| `--switch_after--left`          | Distance from left of icon switch <br> Default: 0.313em                                          |
| `--switch_after--top`           | Distance from top of button switch <br> Default: 0.313em                                         |
| `--switch_after--transition`    | Transition options about the changement of button switch <br> Default: 0.3s                      |
| `--switch_after--width`         | Width of button switch <br> Default: 5.625em                                                     |
